m_szDocTitle: New Market Research Report: Hydrogen Generation Market - Global Forecast to 2021 - Press Release - Digital Journal
m_szDocSumamry: Get More Details on this Report and a Full Table of Contents at Hydrogen Generation Market - Global Forecast to 2021 "Captive hydrogen production: Biggest market by generation & delivery mode" Hydrogen production by captive mode held the largest market share in the global hydrogen generation market in 2015. Captive hydrogen production is expected to continue to account for the largest market share during the forecast period. It reduces the sulfur content of diesel fuel in petroleum refineries, and meets hydrogen demand for use in oil refineries, manufacturing fertilizer, and chemical plants. "
